name: RTCDTMFSender.tonechange_event
description: The tonechange event is sent to an RTCDTMFSender by the WebRTC API to indicate when DTMF tones previously queued for sending (by calling RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF()) begin and end.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'tonechange' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
